channel.title: Forensics on David Araújo
channel.description: Recent content in Forensics on David Araújo

item.title: Old But Gold
item.description: Table of contents Amazing is simple Simple isn’t basic Limitations On the shoulders of giants Quick and easy Project page Like usual, you can find all documents and code here So, before continuing, I must tell you the context of this post. I recently finished college (hurray for me!) and I started working for Cognizant doing Android Reverse Engineering for Google. Due to that, I got a whole new appreciation for what we’ll be discussing today.

item.title: Everything Is A File
item.description: Table of contents What is a file? Is my red blue for you, or my green your green, too? What types of files are there? Why should I care? Keep exploring What is a file? Link to heading Files, everything is a file! You may have heard this phrase in relation to Linux. It’s quite popular among Linux enthusiasts, but beyond being a catchy sentence, what does it actually mean?
